title: John Kasich: "I'm not a moderate, politically"
description: Ohio Gov. John Kasich (R) joins Chuck Todd to talk about the state of the Republican party, Rep. Jim Jordan's bid for House Speaker, and why winning is all that matters in politics.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
